mean_en: giving offense to moral sensibilities and injurious to reputation
word_etyma: dis 不 + grace优雅 + ful...的→ 不名誉的，可耻的
short_phrase: a woman in a disgraceful situation
sentence: Back then people thought it was disgraceful for an unmarried woman to have a child.
sentence_trans: 当时人们认为一个女人未婚就有了孩子是可耻的。
